title: Northrop Grumman Cygnus Spacecraft Launches NASA Science, Cargo to International Space Station - SciTechDaily
description: A fresh supply of 8,300 pounds of scientific investigations and cargo launched from NASA’s Wallops Flight Facility in Virginia at 12:40 p.m. EST on Saturday, February 19, aboard a Northrop Grumman Cygnus resupply spacecraft, and is now traveling to the Intern…
